description:
E-ProMIS is the Electronic Project Monitoring Information System Developed by the Economic Affairs department at  the Treasury. This data-set displays the finance estimates for Projects under the National Government covering the Financial year 2013 - 2014. 

The data is broken down to indicate which part of the national allocations have been made to, such as the draft plan, supplementary I, supplementary II and off-budget Phases. 
The data also indicates whether allocated funds are grants, loans, or sourced from Government tax collections (GOK funding).This breakdown makes it possible to indicate the key actors / players involved in the financing of the project, implementation of the project and utilization of the funds. 

The information on the e-ProMIS System is under continuous update by the  agencies in Kenya and is subject to validation. Should you find any discrepancies please report them to the dataset owner.

name: 2013 - 2014 Estimated Finance allocations for Government Projects (e-ProMIS Portal)
